segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s making me really happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just really sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, and it’s making me feel all warm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but it’s not ruining my mood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice what’s happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, and it’s making me feel really calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all have a good time, even if it’s a little messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just making me really happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much I’m enjoying this.
segments.speaker: PAR
